t:
I've just broken the world record for standing still for the longest time.



This landmine under my feet is really helping.
c:
I might soon only be in the records.



#stand #still #worldrecordholder #landmine #surprise #death #movement #twist





Technically speaking, there're many kinds of mines. And most of them don't make any sound as they show in the movies. Also most of them will go off as soon as stepped on, you don't need to step off. From that point of view, don't get technical with this story, just follow the horror concept.
